name: CVE-2015-3097
description: Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.292 and 14.x through 18.x before 18.0.0.160, Adobe AIR before 18.0.0.144, Adobe AIR SDK before 18.0.0.144, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 18.0.0.144 on 64-bit Windows 7 systems do not properly select a random memory address for the Flash heap, which makes it easier for attackers to conduct unspecified attacks by predicting this address.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:air_sdk_\\&_compiler:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:15.0.0.239:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:14.0.0.179:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:air:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:15.0.0.189:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:15.0.0.246:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:17.0.0.169:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:14.0.0.145:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:17.0.0.188:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:14.0.0.125:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:15.0.0.223:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:15.0.0.152:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:16.0.0.257:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:16.0.0.287:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:air_sdk:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:15.0.0.167:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:16.0.0.296:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:17.0.0.134:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:14.0.0.176:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:16.0.0.235:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:x64:*'))]
